alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland; Roosevelt; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 1:23AM MDT until July 09 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wibaux County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Southeastern Dawson County in northeastern Montana... Eastern Richland County in northeastern Montana... * Until 200 AM MDT. * At 123 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Bonetrail to 17 miles southwest of Wibaux, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sidney, Wibaux, Fairview, Bainville, Savage, Intake, Carlyle, Snowden, Saint Phillip, Nohly, Wooley, Crane, Yates, Hodges, Mccabe, Midway and Burns. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
